availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Pendleton County, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Son of Rolla Hightower and Elizabeth Hightower. Married to Cynthia Ann Wood Hightower. Father of Rolla A. Hightower and Georgianna Hightower. Farmer in Kenton County, Kentucky, in 1850. Merchant in Pendleton County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Kenton County, p. 204B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Pendleton County, p. 472.
Find A Grave, "Merriman Hightower (1828-1874)," Memorial #19885832, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/19885832/merriman-hightower (accessed March 29, 2017).
